trans-unit.source: Represents a configuration element that corresponds to the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpContextBinding"></xref> binding.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpContextBindingElement"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpContextBindingElement"></xref> class with the specified configuration name.
The configuration name of the binding.
The value should be unique because it is used as identification for the binding.
Gets the CLR type of the standard binding associated with this configuration element: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpContextBinding"></xref>.
The CLR type of the standard binding associated with the configuration element.
Gets or sets the client callback address for the binding element.
The client callback address for the binding element.
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether context management is enabled.
`true` if context management is enabled; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets the context protection level of the SOAP header used to propagate the context information.
The context protection level of the SOAP header used to propagate the context information.
The default is <xref href="System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.Sign"></xref>.
Initializes this binding configuration element based on the configuration of the specified binding.
The binding object supplied must be of type <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpContextBinding"></xref>.
The binding that contains the content, context protection level, and content exchange mechanism used to initialize the class.
Applies the configuration of this configuration element to the specified binding instance.
The binding instance specified must be of type <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpContextBinding"></xref>.
The binding that contains the content, context protection level, and content exchange mechanism used to configure the class.

Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.

A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.
